numbered_ace_sentences: 1. These graphs show the diversity in US sports leagues today.
2. The graphs show several sports leagues.
3. In all shown sports except baseball, players of color make up more than half of the players in each league.
4. In baseball, players of color do not make up more than half of the players in the league.
5. In the coaches data, no league has at least 50% coaches of color.
6. In the NFL, coaches of color make up 13% of the coaches.
7. In the MLS, coaches of color make up 41% of the coaches.
8. There are two basketball leagues.
9. One basketball league is a women's basketball league.
10. One basketball league is a men's basketball league.
11. The two basketball leagues have very similar diversity numbers.
12. The other leagues do not show a clear correlation with each other.
13. I wonder what causes the differences between leagues.
14. I wonder if the history of a sport causes the differences.
15. I wonder if the roots of a sport cause the differences.
16. I live in a predominantly white state.
17. I have played many sports.
18. In my state, there are not many players of color.
19. These graphs affect me.
20. These graphs help me understand the diversity in sports across the US.
21. These graphs help me understand the diversity in sports beyond New Hampshire.
22. The headline is: Sporting leagues and their diversity.
